effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Blessing and a Curse
features.flavor: The gods bless and damn in equal measure.
features.trigger: You or another hero ends their turn.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
The target obtains a tier 1 or tier 3 outcome on their power roll (your choice). You can then choose another target within distance, who obtains the opposite outcome on their next power roll.
###### Fulfill Your Destiny (11 Wrath)
*You have looked at various futures, and only this one works.*
| **Magic, Ranged** |   **Triggered** |
| ----------------- | --------------: |
| **üìè Ranged 10**  | **üéØ One ally** |

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target takes their turn after the triggering hero, and immediately removes all conditions and negative effects on themself. During their turn, the target has a double edge on power rolls.
